definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

sentences.english: In total, the first era of One Piece stretches to 516 episodes.
sentences.chinese: 總之，《海賊王》的第一個時代一直到第516集。

sentences.english: Chastity is a wealth that comes from abundance of love.
sentences.chinese: 貞操是從豐盛奧比島范冰冰情中生出來海賊王財產。

sentences.english: How can men succumb to force?
sentences.chinese: 男人怎麼能屈服於“武力”之下？《海賊王》。

sentences.english: I like to see the king, a power-up pirates, a Japanese ships.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡看海賊王，一死死一船日本人。

sentences.english: Those who would like to go to the museum must compriset the school gdined on at 7 tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 想去博物館海賊王前度必需在明晨7點到大門口聚合。

sentences.english: Those who want to go to the museum must be at the school gconsumed at 7 tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 想去博物館海賊王前度必需在明晨7點到大門口聚集。

sentences.english: Even if you've never watched an episode of this series. I really hope you give this one a shot.
sentences.chinese: 即使從沒看過《海賊王》，我也真心希望你能去看看。

definition: serialized/published as a serial (in a newspaper)
Crayon Shin-chan (クレヨンしんちゃん), Japanese manga and anime series popular in China
cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
photobook (loanword from Japanese), generally sexy portraits of an actress or model
to tell others (a secret)/to divulge to an outsider/to be rumored
unofficial biography (as opposed to official dynastic biography)
Journey to the West, Ming dynasty novel by Wu Cheng'en 吳承恩|吴承恩, one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature/also called Pilgrimage to the West or Monkey
